items.value:
Holographic Shield
A holographic shield has been created by former students
of the school to defend themselves against Baldi.
It is only a 20-second shield

Calculator
This device was stolen from school faculty for those who don't have time to solve problems!
Very powerful and helps well in <color=red>hard</color> situations!

Speed Serum
Would you like to run faster without getting in trouble?
Try this potion to improve your speed significantly!

Gravity Device
Is the shield too expensive for you? There is an alternative! Through joint development with a mysterious
person, you can change gravity yourself!
(due to a weak battery, its action is limited to 15 seconds)

Glue
Johnny's glue is unique and strong.
If spilled, people will need to avoid it to prevent getting stuck

Ice Bomb
This ability freezes everyone for 5 seconds and slows them down afterward

Magic Ruby
This magic ruby can create portals, but only one at a time.
The portal will take you back to where you used it last!

Time-Rewind Electronic Wristwatch
The electronic wristwatch that couldn't help marking the next five seconds!
To return these moments to somewhere the school faculty might've appeared...!

Strawbery Flavored Zesty Bar
The Zesty Bar is now more energized with a strawberry flavor!
It restores 450% of stamina but has a side effect of losing stamina even while standing

DSODA Deadly weapon, looks like just normal BSODA. Baldi was about to drink it, but the students secretly added Arsenic, Polonium-210, Cyanides, Ricin, Thallium, Stibine, Batrachotoxin, and Aconitine while he wasn’t looking. Do not carry it with you and be careful! Don’t even touch it!
This item has no description! Report this to Baldi Basics Extra if you see this!

Weight
A great item for those who want to get pumped up!
But it can only be used under the supervision of a trainer

Paint Bucket
Typically intended for painting! Nevertheless, this paint can be poured onto the ground
resulting in a random color appearing on the surface!
Exercise caution, as you can never predict the effects of the paint...

X-Ray Goggles
These goggles enhance your vision, but they come with a green tint

Room Teleporter
An affordable gadget that can transport you immediately to any room in a school

Ruby Clock
Enhanced alarm clock! Features additional time, produces the loudest sound, and much more!

Flipper Zero
Multitool for various tasks! Open a coin slot,tackle math problems, mimic button pressing, and much more!
Usable up to 5 times

Stockfish's Chess Book
A chess book containing solutions for all puzzles by Stockfish!
He chose to write this book to assist students in learning chess moves!
Magic Card In our school was one funny student, he very loved magic tricks One day he forgot his magic card, this is one of them He used it to throw it to someone and swap with them

Sign "NO"
Few days ago random student stole this sign from forest
.Everyone think this sign is danger, so they just avoid it

Baldi's Dashing Pad
Ever want to go down the long hallways without needing to run down the halls due to the Principal?
Then this thing is for you! Even Baldi made it himself!

Baldi Teleporter
Teleporter which Baldi use for fast travelling
He throws this teleporter, waits, and teleports to the wall the teleporter crashed into!
